pages.text: Ancient Scrolls are special items that when used, provide the player with a specific mana enhancement. Please note that you can only bind $(#2895CB)1 Scroll$() to yourself, so choose carefully!
The Capacity scroll can be obtained as a trade from the $(l:archon:world/wizard)Wizard$() villager and increases the player's $(#2895CB)max mana to 200$().
The Accelerate scroll can be obtained as a trade from the $(l:archon:world/wizard)Wizard$() villager and increases the player's mana regen speed to $(#2895CB)2 mana per second$().
